And:
Bug-Tizen: TC-1574

And:

subject: Adding the new service operation 'SERVICE_DATA_AUTOMATICALLY'.
commitMessage:
Adding the new service operation 'SERVICE_DATA_AUTOMATICALLY'.

This key is to be used to inform the launched service to do the things
automatically, with no user prompt/UI. For example, some application
may use it to send an email/sms without the need to deal with any
view/ug.

Change-Id: I17e5556453bb92965fccedbe6ca114cc2b716df7
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>
